useCase.name: Data Movement
useCase.description: A Data Steward needs to move specific data.

preconditions.precondition: Data Steward has access to the Common Data Service.

successEndConditions.condition: The specified data is successfully moved.

useCase.trigger: Data Steward initiates the data movement process.

mainSequence.step: Data Steward specifies the data to be moved.
Common Data Service moves the specified data.
